Actually, Islam is a THEOCRASY, by definition...""""a fusion or mixture of different deities in the minds of worshipers. A form of government in which God (or a deity) is recognized as the king or immediate ruler, and his laws are taken as the statute-book of the kingdom, these laws being usually administered by a priestly order as his ministers and agents; hence a system of government by a sacerdotal order, claiming a divine commission; also, a state so governed.""""

If this guy is right then Mad Magazine offices should be bombed. Or how about Hustler? That's offensive to many people. So because the satirical targets are Muslims it should be tempered? Maybe if the fundamentalist Muslims would stop degrading women and stop chopping people's heads off on video they wouldn't be so lambasted by satirists. It's 2015. Why are we going backwards?? What's next? No more South Park? Once this kind of thinking starts it will end in book burning. Come on people. Forward thinking!

They can also forgive the fine if he stops being a rebellious jerk, advocating against HOA's... When I sold real estate in Mo. It was required buyers were to receive, read and sign off on rules and regulations in the properties HOA's. Now live in Ks. where I had to request a copy! It's the buyers responsibility to make themselves aware, AND to attend yearly meetings when finance and new regulations are voted on. Go live in the country with your 10 dogs chained up in your yard next to your broken down RV, and throw drunken parties half the night. Heck grow pot in the common ground and paint your house purple! Won't be happening in my HOA Governed neighborhood. FYI... houses sell within thirty days on the market, if they make it to market unless they are overpriced. I commend our HOA board members. A thankless job done by volunteers.

You cannot put that down to population size, it would need to be more whites committing more crime for that to make sense. Its why the BLM does not argue that on TV anymore.
